SetDeliveryLocationHotkeyTooltip: Choose a hotkey to set the new location for the Contract Items Delivery Chest. Leave empty to disable.

ShowContractTooltipTooltip: If disabled, hovering over NPCs won't show the contract menu tooltip. Menu access still works.
CollectionDelayTooltip: Time in milliseconds for each individual item to be collected or processed before a contract is delivered.
ContractPercentBasicTooltip: Percentage of the delivered products total value paid for the basic contract.
ContractPercentCustomTooltip: Percentage of the delivered products total value paid for the custom contract.
